remarks: Scalar multiplication distributive law for subtraction.  ( ~ lmodsubdir analog.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clmsubdir.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
clmsubdir.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
clmsubdir.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
clmsubdir.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
clmsubdir.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
clmsubdir.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. CMod ) $.
clmsubdir.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
clmsubdir.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. K ) $.
clmsubdir.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
clmsubdir $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) .x. X ) = ( ( A .x. X ) .- ( B .x. X ) ) ) $.
